entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sorts students into houses at Hogwarts. It is described as giving warnings before times of great danger for the school.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who asks the ghost about the Sorting Hat's warnings.

entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is a ghost who seems glad to turn away from Ron and explains that the Sorting Hat gives warnings before times of great danger for the school.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who eats roast potatoes with enthusiasm and asks how the Sorting Hat can know if the school is in danger.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where the students are attending.

relationships.description: The Sorting Hat gives warnings to Hermione and other students before times of great danger for the school.
Nick turns away from Ron, who is eating roast potatoes with enthusiasm.
The Sorting Hat gives warnings before times of great danger for Hogwarts school.
